hi guys, i am starting as a developer in HubSpot cms and i have some doubts when i want to develop an email template, i wanted to know if inside the content module for email i can use the repeater option to add the amount of items that the user wants. the other thing is how can i make the width and height of a dynamic image in my html + hubl template. for example if i insert an image for the logo and the user wants to change the size?
Thank you for your support to this channel.

Hi there, I have an email with two images that use personalization tokens / HubSpot Properties as links. However, in the email analytics, it comes up as 0% in the HTML click map. How can I track the clicks of a link that's not directly in an email but in a personalization token in the email?

Yes you can use the repeater option. I <https://www.courtneyfantinato.com/custom-HubSpot-email-template/|wrote something up> using it as a way to provide flexible content blocks that you may find helpful.

As for the image, you could allow the end user to upload/choose an image with the image field, and then use the number field to choose a width to display the image at, providing the min and max. Or thereâ€™s other options like the select dropdown if you want to provide pre-defined sizes. It all depends on what you need. But I would only do image width, and set the height to auto.
